146 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccProfile
147 {
148 public:
149  CIccProfile();
150  CIccProfile(const CIccProfile &Profile);
151  CIccProfile &operator=(const CIccProfile &Profile);
152  virtual ~CIccProfile();
153 
154  icHeader m_Header;
155 
156  TagEntryList *m_Tags;
157 
158  CIccTag* FindTag(icSignature sig);
159  bool AttachTag(icSignature sig, CIccTag *pTag);
160  bool DeleteTag(icSignature sig);
161  CIccMemIO* GetTagIO(icSignature sig); //caller should delete returned result
162  bool ReadTags(CIccProfile* pProfile); // will read in all the tags using the IO of the passed profile
163 
164  bool Attach(CIccIO *pIO);
165  bool Detach();
166  bool Read(CIccIO *pIO);
167  icValidateStatus ReadValidate(CIccIO *pIO, std::string &sReport);
168  bool Write(CIccIO *pIO, icProfileIDSaveMethod nWriteId=icVersionBasedID);
169 
170  void InitHeader();
171  icValidateStatus Validate(std::string &sReport) const;
172 
173  icUInt16Number GetSpaceSamples() const;
174 
175  bool AreTagsUnique() const;
176  bool IsTagPresent(icSignature sig) const { return (GetTag(sig)!=NULL); }
177 
178 protected:
179 
180  void Cleanup();
181  IccTagEntry* GetTag(icSignature sig) const;
182  IccTagEntry* GetTag(CIccTag *pTag) const;
183  bool ReadBasic(CIccIO *pIO);
184  bool LoadTag(IccTagEntry *pTagEntry, CIccIO *pIO);
185  bool DetachTag(CIccTag *pTag);
186 
187  // Profile Validation functions
188  icValidateStatus CheckRequiredTags(std::string &sReport) const;
189  bool CheckTagExclusion(std::string &sReport) const;
190  icValidateStatus CheckHeader(std::string &sReport) const;
191  icValidateStatus CheckTagTypes(std::string &sReport) const;
192  bool IsTypeValid(icTagSignature tagSig, icTagTypeSignature typeSig) const;
193  bool CheckFileSize(CIccIO *pIO) const;
194 
195  CIccIO *m_pAttachIO;
196 
197  TagPtrList *m_TagVals;
198 };
